params.name: input_features
params.description: Float values mel features extracted from the raw speech waveform. Raw speech waveform can be obtained byloading a .flac or .wav audio file into an array of type List[float] or a numpy.ndarray, e.g. viathe soundfile library (pip install soundfile). To prepare the array into input_features, theAutoFeatureExtractor should be used for extracting the mel features, padding and conversion into atensor of type torch.FloatTensor. See call()

params.name: head_mask
params.description: Mask to nullify selected heads of the attention modules in the encoder. Mask values selected in [0, 1]:1 indicates the head is not masked,0 indicates the head is masked.

params.name: encoder_outputs
params.description: Tuple consists of (last_hidden_state, optional: hidden_states, optional: attentions)last_hidden_state of shape (batch_size, sequence_length, hidden_size), optional) is a sequence ofhidden-states at the output of the last layer of the encoder.

params.name: output_attentions
params.description: Whether or not to return the attentions tensors of all attention layers. See attentions under returnedtensors for more detail.

params.name: output_hidden_states
params.description: Whether or not to return the hidden states of all layers. See hidden_states under returned tensors formore detail.

params.name: return_dict
params.description: Whether or not to return a ModelOutput instead of a plain tuple.
